sources.title: The Beast of Borneo (1934) JUNGLE ADVENTURE
sources.description:
Stars: Mae Stuart, John Preston, Eugene Sigaloff
 Director: Harry Garson

 A crazed scientist needs primates to conduct experiments to prove his own theory of evolution, so he organizes an expedition into the jungles of Borneo to capture the animals he needs.

sources.title: Beast Of Borneo 1934
sources.description: Jungle thriller about a Russian scientist who believes he can create a youth formula from the glands of orangutans. Marginally a horror film.

metadata.Plot: A crazed scientist needs primates to conduct experiments to prove his own theory of evolution, so he organizes an expedition into the jungles of Borneo to capture the animals he needs.
